text: Tini'i se satta yini tomadigake srsti karechena ekati matra satta theke; ara tara theke'i tairi karechena tara jora, yate tara kache sbasti pete pare. Atahpara purusa yakhana narike abrta karala, takhana, se garbhabati hala. Ati halaka garbha. Se ta'i niye calaphera karate thakala. Tarapara yakhana bojha haye gela, takhana ubhaye'i allahake dakala yini tadera palanakarta ye, tumi yadi amadigake sustha o bhala dana kara tabe amara tomara sukariya adaya karaba.
